name: haunted lab
description:
Hello everyone,  welcome to my first 3D simple game im still working on it you can give me any kind of advices that can help me, i didnt make the map but i created/editted the other things and just left the map without editting because i liked it.

The enemies will be changed by the one lighted behind the player you will undrestand when you play the game.

Enjoy and have fun.
